definition: surname Xue/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC)
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]

(of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa
Xue Baochai, female character in Dream of Red Mansions, married to Jia Baoyu 賈寶玉|贾宝玉
Xue Rengui (614-683) great Tang dynasty general
Xuecheng district of Zaozhuang city 棗莊市|枣庄市[Zao3 zhuang1 shi4], Shandong
Xuecheng district of Zaozhuang city 棗莊市|枣庄市[Zao3 zhuang1 shi4], Shandong
Xue Fucheng (1838-1894), Qing official and progressive political theorist
Xue Juzheng (912-981), Song historian and compiler of History of the Five Dynasties between Tang and Song 舊五代史|旧五代史
Xue Ji (649-713), one of Four Great Calligraphers of early Tang 唐初四大家[Tang2 chu1 Si4 Da4 jia1]

sentences.english: The rainy weather, xue antai killed in the car watching Ceng Nianan and hands.
sentences.chinese: 天氣下着雨，薛安泰在車裏看着曾念安和手下撕殺。

sentences.english: She doesn't like to sit there doing nothing.
sentences.chinese: 她沒有情願甚麼也沒有乾枯坐正在閡薛。

sentences.english: The method to solve Schrodinger equation with metrix function theory is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出應用矩陣函數理論來解薛定格方程的方法。

sentences.english: It called for Xue Feng's immediate release and deportation to the United States.
sentences.chinese: 美國大使館呼籲立即釋放薛峯並把他遣返回美國。

sentences.english: On the contrary, Dr. Xue was a very weak collaborator.
sentences.chinese: 相反的，薛博士是一名很差勁合作者。

sentences.english: But I will send a fire into the house of Hazael, which shall devour the palaces of Benhadad.
sentences.chinese: 我卻要降火在哈薛的家中，燒滅便哈達的宮殿。

sentences.english: Thanks Mr. Xue Baolin for giving us a speech.
sentences.chinese: 感謝中遠集團船員代表薛寶林的講話。

sentences.english: Xue Fengxiang was an outstanding gardener of the peony garden in the Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 薛鳳翔爲我國明代傑出的牡丹園藝學家。

sentences.english: Hazael king of Aram oppressed Israel throughout the reign of Jehoahaz.
sentences.chinese: 約哈斯年間，亞蘭王哈薛屢次欺壓以色列人。

sentences.english: The story told by Dr. Xue has been created from a sick mind.
sentences.chinese: 薛博士所講的故事是一個有病的心理所編造的。

sentences.english: Dkeen will get a birthday gift from his sister.
sentences.chinese: 戴維將從他的姐姐閡薛得到一份死日禮品。

sentences.english: His two roommates in Chengdu remind him of the quake.
sentences.chinese: 在成都的兩位室友使薛梟想起當年的地震。

sentences.english: Xue three-lane county and township road transit.
Cheval's palace is open every day except Christmas Day and New Year's Day.
sentences.chinese: 薛瓦勒的宮殿是開放的，除非聖誕節和元旦每天。

definition: first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
pitchpipe, pitch standard, one of the twelve semitones in the traditional tone system
